pkgmetadata.longdescription: Constructing Hierarchical Voronoi Tessellations and Overlay Heatmap for Data Analysis // Constructing hierarchical voronoi tessellations for a given data set and overlay heatmap for variables at various levels of the tessellations for in-depth data analysis. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Voronoi_diagram for more information. Credits to Mu Sigma for their continuous support throughout the development of the package.
